pr_title: Invalidate duties for epoch+2 and beyond when a new block is imported

timeline.message:
Invalidate duties for epoch+2 and beyond when a new block is imported.
Normally this has no effect as we wouldn't schedule duties that far ahead, but if we thought we were in sync and then discovered blocks from more than an epoch ago that we didn't have, we may need to recalculate some duties.

timeline.body:
nit: this could make the check more explicit/legible
```suggestion
    verify(validatorApiChannel, once()).getDuties(UnsignedLong.valueOf(5), VALIDATOR_KEYS);
```

replies.bodyText: The verifyNoMoreInteractions is a lot more strict though - it will pick up if any other epoch is requested which is what I'm looking for.
